name: radioactivity_concentration_of_244Am_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Am" means the element "americium" and "244Am" is the isotope "americium-244" with a half-life of 4.20e-01 days.
